Package com.dimelo.dimelosdk.main

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
RcFragment
com.dimelo.dimelosdk.main.Chat
public class Chat extends RcFragment
 A Fragment displaying a chat.
 Call "Dimelo.newChatFragment()" to instantiate one.
